When Vladimir suddenly falls ill and his volatile, nihilistic daughter comes back into the picture, Elena must hatch a plan for her own survival.","poster_path":"/pdSxysKTeE6oTYhtVBF08Nwj2Ir.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18,53],"popularity":15.281,"release_date":"2011-06-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.273,"vote_count":222},{"backdrop_path":"/1GEfRXb4tfRAnLZH1ov11h9nBTS.jpg","id":444218,"title":"Three Seconds","original_title":"Движение вверх","overview":"The story is set at the 1972 Munich Olympics where the U.S. team lost the basketball championship for the first time in 36 years. The final moments of the final game have become one of the most controversial events in Olympic history. With play tied, the score table horn sounded during a second free throw attempt that put the U.S. ahead by one. But the Soviets claimed they had called for a time out before the basket and confusion ensued. The clock was set back by three seconds twice in a row and the Russians finally prevailed at the very last. The U.S. protested, but a jury decided in the USSR’s favor and Team USA voted unanimously to refuse its silver medals. The Soviet players have been treated as heroes at home.","poster_path":"/g7dr7pC2JYOBi3heCudlI5Ec5jY.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":14.314,"release_date":"2017-12-28","video":false,"vote_average":7.182,"vote_count":151},{"backdrop_path":"/eYpu1C6Xe3FzHaw5MtMVxLjBtJf.jpg","id":157843,"title":"Queen of the Desert","original_title":"Queen of the Desert","overview":"A chronicle of Gertrude Bell's life, a traveler, writer, archaeologist, explorer, cartographer, and political attaché for the British Empire at the dawn of the twentieth century.","poster_path":"/9WrxqWttzNiEgKGIm3mDteu6jmq.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18,12,36],"popularity":15.42,"release_date":"2015-09-03","video":false,"vote_average":5.901,"vote_count":268},{"backdrop_path":"/2etHdGsw9Y8sP672w3zVxlo36Dp.jpg","id":574434,"title":"God Exists, Her Name Is Petrunya","original_title":"Господ постои, името ѝ е Петрунија","overview":"In Stip, a small town in Macedonia, every January the local priest throws a wooden cross into the river and hundreds of men dive after it. Her competitors are furious - how dare a woman take part in their ritual? All hell breaks loose, but Petrunya holds her ground.
